attributes.title: Very disappointing :(
attributes.review: I was looking forward to viewing whatever news my president was publishing, but instead all I got were offensive statements and I felt threatened 😭 please do not download this app 😎 it takes hours to actually download!!! I wish I would have known how awful it was before I installed it, but I’ll do anything for that ugly, racist, homophobic, xenophobic orange in the White House! May his white supremacy and manhood save this country, but he will not achieve anything with this awful app. God bless America, y’all ❤️😔

attributes.title: Ok boomers
attributes.review: Idc about this app or anything I j saw this guy on tictoc that wants this app to be taken down for some reason and I don’t really like trump and also BLM✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿 and GO GAYS🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🌈🌈🌈🌈 also on a completely unrelated note Apple should add all lgbt flags to their flag section on emojis

attributes.title: Bad app :(
attributes.review: I’ve had this app for so long and it has not done anything it is supposed too! It wants me to play games and listen to music whilst in the app and it won’t let me see any campaign things 😰 0 STARS DON’T GET THIS APP!!

attributes.title: gen z 2020✨🧚🏼
attributes.review: This app was horrible it was recommended to me by my uncle😡 he’s in jail now thankfully😚 but it kept making my phone restart at random times. so i think trump is trying to bAn gEn Z fRoM tHe iNtErNet🔫 however, you can not hide from us bunker boy. we will find you😁 you CAN NOT stop us🤡 we are not the kind of people you don’t want to go to war with.🧚🏼✨ we will win and there’s nothing you can do to stop us😌hope the weathers nice down in your bunker😚

attributes.title: PLEASE READ THIS
attributes.review:
i really dont like this app. first of, its too laggy for my phone. second of, it keep making my phone die quicker. third of, it keeps crashing when i try to get in the app. fourth of, im really mad because it doesnt work. 
I don't recommend getting this app. too laggy. crashes too much. and it doesnt work.

attributes.title: If I could give this 0 stars I would
attributes.review: This app is absolutely crap. There is nothing worse than this app, literally nothing. NOT. A. THING. If you want to download it in support of trump then you’re probably a sad excuse for a human being but that’s just one girls opinion. This app hacked all of my stuff and shared my social security, all my passwords, my bank details etc all over the Internet.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app is total 🧚🏻🧚🏼‍♀️g a r b a g e🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏻 just like d o n a l d  here🦆🦆

attributes.title: messed up my phone!!😫😠
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to listen to every single documented clip (no reading included) of our great president speaking. however after i downloaded the app and signed in i couldn’t exit the app or turn my volume up and down in order to hear donald’s beautiful voice comfortably. eventually my entire phone stopped working and i had to take it in to get it fixed and i think it is because of this app!! you have been warned!📵🇺🇸

attributes.title: Need improvement
attributes.review: App glitches out way too many times for comfort and took 10 minutes to load introductory page

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app gave my phone so issues. The first time I opened it my phone crashed and then it erased all of my contacts and now it has given my phone many many viruses. I do not reccoment this app.
